title: Cant redeem free garen skin
body: I just started following Lol on twitter and when I try to redeem free garen skin I get this error : There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again.  Is the skin unobtainable now or just a random bug?

replies.body: I have the same problem. Help xD.
Got the same problem, how can i fix it?
Hey, these should be added now.  The promos are a bit old so they might crap out sometimes.  Thanks fr the follows!
Yes it has. Thank you for fast reply.
